Helen Walker

WotD8 - cipher, or why life is a puzzle

Aug 3, 2015

Crikey - it's all got a bit philosophical today.  The word of the day is 'cipher'.

The great (and difficult) thing about our randomly brainstormed list of words is that it makes it difficult to make nice clean connections, and that forces me to really think.

It's day 8. #WordOfTheDay is #Cipher. #HeadScratcher #Tricky #PositivePostIts http://helenwalker.net/2015/08/03/wotd8-cipher/

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Aug 3, 2015 at 1:45am PDT

So today's post-it is about unravelling life lessons and trying to be better. As the great Maya Angelou wrote:

“I did then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better.”

So let's see what the comes of that.
